command.source: select rac.rac_id, tier.prc_term_typ_cd, c.eff_dt, c.term_dt, FRMA_TYP_CD as formula, CLM_TYP_CD, CLM_TYP_QLFR_CD,tier.CLM_TYP_QLFR_VL as split_level, ts.clnt_min_amt, ts.clnt_splt_pct, tier.tier_up_lvl_amt, tier.tier_up_lvl_qty, tier.tier_splt_clnt_pct,' ' ,ts.PRC_TYP_CD,rac.rbat_id, rule.ALT_COAL_RPT_IN from client_reg.crt_clnt_rule_assc c join client_reg.crt_clnt_prc_pool_assc rac on c.rbat_id=rac.rbat_id join client_reg.crt_prc_pool p on p.prc_rule_id = c.prc_rule_id and p.pool_typ_cd = rac.pool_typ_cd join client_reg.crt_prc_term_shr ts on ts.prc_pool_id = p.prc_pool_id join client_reg.crt_prc_tier tier on ts.prc_term_shr_id=tier.prc_term_id and ts.PRC_TYP_CD=tier.PRC_TYP_CD join CLIENT_REG.CRT_PRC_RULE rule on c.PRC_RULE_ID = rule.PRC_RULE_ID where tier.prc_term_typ_cd = '1' and c.eff_dt<c.term_dt and c.term_dt>='01/01/2004'
command.target: INSERT INTO rps.t_splits_pricing_base (RAC_ID, PRC_TERM_TYP_CD, EFF_DT, TERM_DT, FORMULA, CLM_TYP_CD, CLM_TYP_QLFR_CD, SPLIT_LEVEL, CLNT_MIN_AMT, CLNT_SPLT_PCT, TIER_UP_LVL_AMT, TIER_UP_LVL_QTY, TIER_SPLT_CLNT_PCT, PMPM_CD ,PRC_TYP_CD, RBAT_ID, ALT_COAL_RPT_IN ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

command.source: select rac.rac_id, tier.prc_term_typ_cd, c.eff_dt, c.term_dt, guar_typ_cd as guarantee, CLM_TYP_CD, CLM_TYP_QLFR_CD,tier.CLM_TYP_QLFR_VL as split_level, tg.clnt_amt, 0, tier.tier_up_lvl_amt, tier.tier_up_lvl_qty, tier.tier_splt_clnt_pct, tg.pmpm_cd ,tg.PRC_TYP_CD,rac.rbat_id, rule.ALT_COAL_RPT_IN from client_reg.crt_clnt_rule_assc c join client_reg.crt_clnt_prc_pool_assc rac on c.rbat_id=rac.rbat_id join client_reg.crt_prc_pool p on p.prc_rule_id = c.prc_rule_id and p.pool_typ_cd = rac.pool_typ_cd join client_reg.crt_prc_term_guar tg on tg.prc_pool_id = p.prc_pool_id join client_reg.crt_prc_tier tier on tg.prc_term_guar_id=tier.prc_term_id and tg.PRC_TYP_CD=tier.PRC_TYP_CD join CLIENT_REG.CRT_PRC_RULE rule on c.PRC_RULE_ID = rule.PRC_RULE_ID where tier.prc_term_typ_cd = '2' and ((guar_typ_cd<>'1' and tier.CLM_TYP_QLFR_VL<>'99') or guar_typ_cd='1') and c.term_dt>'12/31/2003' and c.eff_dt<c.term_dt
command.target: INSERT INTO rps.t_splits_pricing_base (RAC_ID, PRC_TERM_TYP_CD, EFF_DT, TERM_DT, FORMULA, CLM_TYP_CD, CLM_TYP_QLFR_CD, SPLIT_LEVEL, CLNT_MIN_AMT, CLNT_SPLT_PCT, TIER_UP_LVL_AMT, TIER_UP_LVL_QTY, TIER_SPLT_CLNT_PCT, PMPM_CD, PRC_TYP_CD, RBAT_ID, ALT_COAL_RPT_IN ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

catch.command:
[ERROR] GDX -> DM REFRESH - rps.t_splits_pricing_base

#if (${system.getProperty('logfile')}) #end
Host:${localhost}
Started:${startTime}
Script:${scriptName}
